description: This Java class defines a mock implementation of an IAS Sensor device for testing purposes. It extends MockZigbeeDevice and implements MockSensor, encapsulating multiple device clusters such as zone, OTA upgrade, poll control, diagnostics, temperature measurement, and power configuration. The class provides methods to simulate sensor states like low battery, fault, tampering, temperature, and trouble conditions, as well as sending check-in signals.

classes.name: MockIASSensor
classes.description: A mock implementation of an IAS (Intruder Alarm System) Sensor device, simulating various device behaviors and states for testing purposes.

methods.name: setLowBattery
methods.description: Sets the low battery status on the zone cluster.

methods.name: isLowBattery
methods.description: Checks if the zone cluster reports a low battery condition.

methods.name: setBatteryVoltage
methods.description: Sets the battery voltage on the zone cluster.

methods.name: getBatteryVoltage
methods.description: Retrieves the current battery voltage from the zone cluster.

methods.name: setFaulted
methods.description: Sets the faulted status on the zone cluster.

methods.name: isFaulted
methods.description: Checks if the zone cluster reports a fault condition.

methods.name: isTampered
methods.description: Checks if the zone cluster reports a tampered status.

methods.name: setTampered
methods.description: Sets the tampered status on the zone cluster.

methods.name: setMeasuredTemperature
methods.description: Sets the measured temperature in the temperature measurement cluster.

methods.name: getMeasuredTemperature
methods.description: Retrieves the measured temperature from the temperature measurement cluster.

methods.name: isTroubled
methods.description: Checks if the zone cluster reports a trouble condition.

methods.name: setTroubled
methods.description: Sets the troubled status on the zone cluster.

methods.name: sendCheckIn
methods.description: Simulates sending a check-in message via the poll control cluster.

methods.name: sendComcastCheckIn
methods.description: Simulates sending a detailed Comcast check-in message via the poll control cluster.
